description:
Located on a spacious 668m2 block in one of Brisbane's most popular family friendly suburbs, here is an opportunity to build your dream. It features a large swimming pool for those hot summer Queensland days, and five bedrooms with plenty of potential to extend.

You will absolutely love the convenience this location has to offer with a bus stop situated just after stepping outside making the city commute a breeze, a quick drive to the Gateway Motorway, Brisbane Airport, and of course Westfield Carindale.

Offering excellent school pockets, you will be nearby Mayfield State School, San Sisto College, and St Martin's Catholic Primary School ensuring school trips are trouble-free.

If you enjoy sports and the outdoors this property is extremely close to Carina Leagues Club, Clem Jones Sports Centre, Seven Hills Bushland Reserve, and not to forget the up and coming Minnippi Golf Course due for completion this year.

Make sure you add this to your inspection list and to find out more please contact Tony King on 0416 847 686 or Clint Ferguson on 0427 856 496 today.

Approx. 7kms to Brisbane CBD
Approx. 900m to Seven Hills Bushland Reserve
Approx. 2.5kms to Cannon Hill Anglican College
Approx. 350m to Mayfield State School
Approx. 1km to Carina State School
Approx. 1km to San Sisto College
Approx. 1km to Saint Martin's Catholic Primary School
Approx. 2.1kms to Whites Hill College
Approx. 1.9kms to Camp Hill State School
Approx. 1km to Little Wishes Day Care Centre
Approx. 800m to Clem Jones Centre
Approx. 2kms to Westfield Carindale
Approx. 1km to Cannon Hill Shopping Centre
Approx. 200m to Minnippi Parklands
Approx. 2.2kms to Gateway Motorway
Approx. 6kms to Pacific Motorway

Rental Appraisal $750-$800/week

Current Rates $473.91/quarter

Information contained on any marketing material, website or other portal should not be relied upon and you should make your own enquiries and seek your own independent advice with respect to any property advertised or the information about the property.


Spacious 668sqm block
Generous sized pool
5 Bedrooms
Ceiling Fans throughout
Excellent access to express bus services
Walking Distance to Minnippi Parklands
